metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0634 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: none. Reason: This candidate was withdrawn by its CNA. Further investigation showed that it was not a security issue. Notes: none.

notes.Note: alexmurray> From a quick look at the upstream bug report and inspecting the code, I can't see how this could be exploited / influenced to escalate privileges etc and so I suspect this is not a real vulnerability.

criterions.comment: shadow: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
